description:
This comprehensive IELTS course was created by Michelle, a highly experienced English teacher, who has taught at one of Australia's leading universities.

Whether you are doing the Academic version of the IELTS exam so that you can study at university in an English speaking country or the General Training version of the IELTS exam so that you can emigrate to or work in an English-speaking country, both versions are covered in detail in this course to ensure you are fully prepared.

With a strong emphasis on exam questions and tips on how to approach each component of the Listening, Reading, Writing and Speaking Sections of the exam; this is the perfect course for anyone planning on sitting the IELTS exam.
title: IELTS - How To Achieve An Overall Band Score Of 9
